/**
 * Auto generated module to execute XUnit tests.
 */
module %appName%_xunit%qualifier% {
    package xunit     import xunit.xtclang.org;
    package engine    import xunit_engine.xtclang.org;
    package %appName% import %appName%%qualifier%;

    import engine.console.ConsoleRunner;

    Boolean run(String[] args) {
        Module m = %appName%.as(Module);
        ConsoleRunner runner = new ConsoleRunner();
        return runner.run(m);
    }
}
